title: Is taraweeh for a woman better at home and can she recite longer Surahs from Phone? - Assimalhakeem
transcript: Hejira says that can I offer taraweeh at home alone and recite from my phone the answer is definitely yes you can pray taraweeh on your own at home as a female and this is better and best for you than praying in the message and you can use your mobile phone you can use the the Koran itself and recite as many as you wish and a large social knows best the
